transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello sir, good morning.
Customer: Bolo, good morning.
Executive: Sir, sir Meenakshi bol rahi hu.
Customer: Bolo.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi, aapka aapne kaha tha na ki aaj baat karenge sir. To isiliye maine call kiya, aapka miss call tha na? To hum log humne call kiya tha to aap nahi utha paaye the. Fir aapne call kiya to hum nahi utha paaye. To sir wohi bataiye sir feedback ka kaisa feedback hai? Aap to buyleads choose karte hain but calls nahi uthate sir.
Customer: IndiaMART ki buyer ki.
Executive: Aapki aapki seva seva se asantusht hai.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Okay. To sir theek hai, aap mujhe bataiye, main puri koshish karungi ki jo bhi aapki problem hai.
Customer: Aapko kya batana, meri baat suno, aapki company ko kya batana, roz roz kya batana, koi har teesre din bolta hai main aapka manager hu, main aapka manager hu aur main manager hu, mujhe batao problem hai, mujhe batao kis kisko batau problem. To banda hai nahi.
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Koi alag se alag se problem batane ki zarurat nahi hai. Aapki problem aapke jo bhi hamare previous manager bhi hote hain aapse baat karte hain na, to unka history hamare paas capture rehta hai. Theek hai? Aur jaise Ravi ka catalog handle ho.
Customer: Aapke paas free hai to aap mere ko kyun puchh raha hai, aise dekh ke problem solve kar do na fir.
Executive: Sir fir sir feedback ke liye to hum har 30 days mein to aapko connect karenge na sir. Purpose of calling to aapko yahi tha ki har 30 days mein hum aapko connect kar rahe the sir.
Executive: Hum aapka jo dekh rahe hain yaha pe, aapne jo abhi basically apni services ko woh kiya hai IndiaMART pe. To sir abhi aapka jo January mein hai, January mein aapka due hone wala hai. Aapke bahut saare complaints bhi jo aaye the buyer ke woh bhi poore hadd tak koshish kiya hai team ne usko solve karne ki.
Customer: Nahi aap solve kyun kar rahe, kis liye kar rahe ho? Kya kaam hai unse?
Executive: Sir abhi to aapka ek minute meri baat suno, ye to hamara party ka matter hai. Aap kyun solve kar rahe ho isko?
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: To aapko solve karne main ek minute meri baat suno, main aapko jo solve karne ke liye aapko matter de rakha hai woh aapse solve hota nahi hai. Aap ye faltu ke matter solve kar rahe ho, hamare party ko beech mein kuch hai hi nahi hai to theek hai koi kaam kaaj ki wajah se koi maal ek do din late ho jaata hai woh baat woh woh matter hai. But aap aapko jo solve karni hai woh cheez to aap solve karte nahi ho, jo nahi karni hai woh solve kar rahe ho.
Executive: Sir sir party lekin us beech mein complaint kar de raha hai na aapke against IndiaMART pe. To meri legal team to karegi na sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi meri baat suno, aapki party ki complaint party ki complaint aapko wajib hai, hamari complaint aapko wajib nahi hai kya? Hum paise nahi dete aapko kya?
Executive: Sir bilkul dete hain, main to apne supplier ke liye.
Customer: To fir hamari kya to ab hamari kuch hai hi nahi, hamara to hai hi nahi, party ki padi hai aapko bina bina paise mein woh kaam sab nipata rahi hai, hum paise deke bhi nahi nahi nipata pa rahe. To iska matlab kya hua?
Executive: Sir mere liye dono hi customers jo hai na woh utne hi important hai sir. Main aapko wohi baar baar batana chah rahi hu ki sir aap ye mat sochiye ki mere liye koi aur sir jitna supplier hai utna buyer bhi hai. Theek hai? Hum dono ke liye utna hi karte hain. Aapki.
Customer: Supplier ki aap sunte kaha ho?
Executive: Sir kaise nahi sunenge sir, main agar nahi sun hum log nahi sunte to is matlab hamara customer range bhi to dekhe na sir. Aapka ho sakta hai aapki expectation jo hogi woh shayad humne aapka nahi kiya hoga but aisa nahi hai ki hum supplier ka bilkul nahi sunte sir.
Executive: Supplier hume pay kar raha hai to hum kaise nahi sunenge sir, aap mujhe ek cheez ye bataiye.
Customer: Meri baat suno, aap sunte hain to 12 mahine 12 mahine se meri mera dekho na mera ek rupaye ka kaam hua isme to dekh ke mere ko batao na aapka ek rupaye ka idhar kaam hua hai. Aapke samne matter to sab aapke samne pada hai na hamare feedback to aapke samne pada hai sab solve to aap batao na mere ko kaha mera ek bhi pura 12 mahine mein ek bhi aapke yaha se company se ek rupaye bhi ka ek rupaye ka abhi kaam hua batao na mere ko kaha hai aapka? Aapke paas detail to sab padi hai na, mere ko batao na aap kaha hua aapka kaam.
Executive: Sir to ye jo buyer ye jo buyer aapke liye complaint kar rahe hain inke saath aapki deal nahi hui hai bas aise hi complaint kar rahe hain sir aapke?
Customer: Meri baat suno, 12 mahine mein ek ek do deal ho gayi, ek do deal ho gayi to usme maine kya aapka pura paisa vasool kar diya?
Executive: Sir bilkul nahi kiya hoga, main mana nahi kar rahi.
Customer: Nahi main aapko kar diya kya maine? To aap kaisi baat kar rahe ho mam?
Executive: Nahi nahi are sir har kisi ka na jo return of investment dekhne ka alag hoga. Aapka alag hoga, kisi aur ka itna rehta hai ki hum log bhi sir din bhar customer se hi baat karte hain. Har customer ka jo way hota hai na dekhne ka apna.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute meri baat suno, aap customer se baat karte ho mere paas aapka kabhi call aaya nahi aur jab aapke mere ko malum abhi aapka 11 mahina chal raha hai pehle mahine mein aapki kehne ka matlab khatam ho raha hai package khatam ho raha hai isiliye aap mere ko abhi ha January mein khatam isiliye aap mere ko baar baar call kar rahe ho. Pehle aap kaha gaye the pura saal pure year kaha gaye the aap log?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Pure saal aap log kaha gaye the mujhe batao nahi. Sir Ravi aapka support manager tha, Ravi ho gaya hai. Abhi aap bane ho sir baki wale to kahi gaye nahi ghar pe to gaye nahi woh to kar sakte the na call.
Executive: Sir kisko call aap sir unhone bhi aapko try kiya hai call karne ki sir. Aisa nahi hai ki unhone bilkul try nahi kiya. Din bhar jab calling ka hi kaam hai sir woh kaise customer chhod dega? Ye bhi mujhe bataiye na.
Customer: Meri baat suno, mere paas to aap se pehle ek mam ka aur nahi sir ka call aaya tha mere paas. Mere ko bol rahe aapki kehne ka matlab ye pura ho raha hai package pura ho raha hai. Aapko aapko kaise service denge abhi aap.
Executive: Kya hai?
Customer: Jab main main kya bolu? Are Ravi wavi hota main unko nahi jaanta mam. Mujhe usse koi matlab nahi hai. Jab unka jab unka package khatam hone laga hai unko malum hai abhi customer chala jayega to fir woh humko response dena shuru kar diya. Aur pichli baar aise ka aisa hua jab aapka unka package khatam hone ko aaya tab woh mere ko call upar call karna shuru kar diya sir aise kar denge aapko aise ek baar aap mere upar vishwas karo is baar vishwas aapka nahi hoga kaam to fir mere ko aap bolna ek baar vishwas karo woh karo karke mere ko isko kehne se maine wapas package agar us time mere ko malum hota to us time karwata hi nahi na is baar main ye galti karunga thodi meri mein. Jo galti kar di woh kar di baar baar thodi hamare ko baat thodi pade waise kehne ka matlab. Hum log tumhare aap logo ke kehne ka matlab aapke logo ko respect karte hain har cheez sab kuch karte hain aur fir log aap log hamare upar dhyan hi nahi dete ho jab aapka package khatam hona shuru hota hai ek do mahina tab aap phone karna shuru kar dete ho sir aapko kya problem hogi bas kya ho gaya kya ho gaya.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hai hum har mahine har 30 dino mein apne customer ko call karte hain pehla.
Customer: Mere paas record dekho na aapke paas record rehta hai sab dekho na aap kaha aaya mere paas call.
Executive: Mere paas record hai aapka sir record hai mere paas aapka aise hi kaise baat kar lungi sir aapko aur sir aap mujhe ye bataiye.
Customer: Aap meri baat suno aapke paas record hai na to mera aapke paas record hai na to meri complaint kab meri complaint ka solve hua kuch?
Executive: Sir aapki complaint kaun si solve nahi hui hai aapki to sabse zyada complaint aapke buyer ne aapke liye kar rakhi hai sir woh to saari.
Customer: Ha to buyer se lo na aap to fir meri baat to buyer se bhi karwana unko hi bolna buyer karwa denge mera package woh kar denge mere ko aap kyun faltu call kar rahe ho?
Executive: Dekhiye aap buyer ke saath kuch kare.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is dissatisfied with IndiaMART service.

- Feels calls are made only when package expires.

- Believes IndiaMART prioritizes buyers over suppliers.



Resolution:

- Executive assured equal importance to buyers/suppliers.

- Explained the purpose of regular feedback calls.

- Mentioned team tried to solve buyer complaints.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, complaints, buyers, service, feedback
